data.event: The population jumped from 26,228 in 2000 to 32,797 in 2010.

event.title: 1843, the first Board of County Commissioners, appointed

data.event: In 1843, the first Board of County Commissioners, appointed by the General Assembly, selected an area in the center of the county as the county seat and Monroe was incorporated that year.
In 1843, the first Board of County Commissioners, appointed by the General Assembly, selected an area in the center of the county as the county seat and Monroe was incorporated that year.
